attributes.action: Remove Judge Francis Gilbert from his position and CORRECTLY punish the paedophile Christopher Mcarthur and any other peadophile being spared ANY Jail Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Christopher McArthur, 21, had previously pleaded guilty to two counts of possessing indecent images of children and three of making them, asking for seven similar offences to be taken into consideration"

But this lad has been spared jail time?
Again Judge Fracis Gilbert has Spared another paedophile from getting a jail sentence they deserve. And aloud to freely walk around the streets as if he has done nothing wrong. If you think like me that this is an utter disgrace then please sign the petition and try and make a change. 
Its their choice to do what they have done why not serve the correct punishment!! Think and support all those poor children !!!!!!

rejection.details: We do not accept e-petitions about individual cases; individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
